alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macomb and central St. Clair Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Armada, or near Richmond, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Richmond around 220 PM EDT. Memphis around 235 PM EDT. Emmett around 250 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Riley Center, Allenton, Berville, Columbus, Rattle Run, Goodells, Smiths Creek and New Haven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
